Set # 30188 Cute Kitten: Another fun little Creator Polybag animal for you to build. But is it truly a good polybag? Read on and find out based on the pro con model.

column2: Imaginative build using many sloped pieces to replicate the kitty look.
Instructions are easy to follow, like most polybags.
Moveable limbs use Technic pins to rotate.
Completed model is cute and cuddly looking, blocky kitty is fun looking and merges medium and light stone grey colours with white to make a solid looking kitty build.
• Not a fan of the choice for whiskers on this kitty build, sadly not many alternative pieces for that are available.
• Big blocky head makes kitty model top heavy when legs are in different poses.
• Tail build has visible studs, not a problem for me, other builders may not enjoy this aesthetic.

column1: Overall I suspect many of you will enjoy this set, there may be a few of you that aren’t a fan of the mini animal builds from polybags. Or feel that this model is too chunky to be truly cute; however I find the model to be serviceable for what it’s attempting. It’s a nice looking model that could have used the newer ball joints in a much more poseable kitty, if you’d prefer to MOC one then why not try it.

Still a strong offering from Creator, I think it’s much more solid compared to the Eagle that I never managed to find in my area. So I recommend this to fans of Creator Polybags and Polybags in general.
